summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2936, for the improvement of 29th Avenue Northeast from the north line of Shay's Ravenna Addition to the City of Seattle, to East 65th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, by constructing wooden curbs and gutters; by constructing concrete sidewalks with the necessary wooden cross walks; by providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 35462 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
